doc.description:
A user's preference system linked to options and user classes

A preference consists in a row with an ID_OPTION and a ID_USER, ID_GROUP, or PUBLIC.
The class needs a user object on which each query will be based.
This class must be able to:
- read options with the same arguments as the option class (filtered based on preference existence)
- retrieve preference(s) for an option
- write preference by adding to an existing set or setting a unique

name: bbn\User\Preferences

getPreferences.name: getPreferences

__construct.name: __construct

doc.description: Constructor.

arguments.name: cfg
arguments.description: A configuration array for tha tables' structure

doc.description: Preferences constructor.

params.name: $cfg
params.description: A configuration array for tha tables' structure

__construct.comments:
/**
   * Preferences constructor.
   *
   * @param Db $db The database connection object
   * @param array $cfg A configuration array for tha tables' structure
   * @throws Exception
   */

getClassCfg.name: getClassCfg
getClassCfg.summary: Returns an array describing the structures of the tables for the class.
getClassCfg.comments:
/**
   * Returns an array describing the structures of the tables for the class.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->getClassCfg();
   *
   * // (array) = [
   * //   "table" => "bbn_users_options",
   * //   "tables" => [
   * //     "user_options" => "bbn_users_options",
   * //     "user_options_bits" => "bbn_users_options_bits"
   * //   ],
   * //   "arch" => [
   * //     "user_options" => [
   * //       "id" => "id",
   * //       "id_option" => "id_option",
   * //       "num" => "num",
   * //       "id_user" => "id_user",
   * //       "id_group" => "id_group",
   * //       "id_alias" => "id_alias",
   * //       "public" => "public",
   * //       "id_link" => "id_link",
   * //       "text" => "text",
   * //       "cfg" => "cfg"
   * //     ],
   * //     "user_options_bits" => [
   * //       "id" => "id",
   * //       "id_user_option" => "id_user_option",
   * //       "id_parent" => "id_parent",
   * //       "id_option" => "id_option",
   * //       "num" => "num",
   * //       "text" => "text",
   * //       "cfg" => "cfg"
   * //     ]
   * //   ]
   * // ];
   * ```
   *
   * @return array
   */

retrieveIds.name: retrieveIds
retrieveIds.summary: Returns all preferences' IDs from the option's ID.
retrieveIds.comments:
/**
   * Returns all preferences' IDs from the option's ID.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->retrieveIds("944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe");
   *
   * // (array) = [
   * //   "8380126d2b4d11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "309f8a1c2c2f11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "ef2cefe52c2f11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "042b29722c2f11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "eac3729c2b6c11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "d38e7e692cd011eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "26e3dd9a2c2611eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "3ef413ad2b6b11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "f47d188b2b5911eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "179d85a0284911eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "7238e8932c0e11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "89ceab0b2aa111eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "96203fbb2b5911eca47652540000cfbe",
   * // ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param null|string $id_option
   * @return null|array
   * @throws Exception
   */

retrieveUserIds.name: retrieveUserIds
retrieveUserIds.summary: Returns preferences' IDs from the option's ID and the given user ID.
retrieveUserIds.comments:
/**
   * Returns preferences' IDs from the option's ID and the given user ID.

   * ```

   * //   "d38e7e692cd011eca47652540000cfbe",

   * //   "3ef413ad2b6b11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "f47d188b2b5911eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "179d85a0284911eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "7238e8932c0e11eca47652540000cfbe",

   * // ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param null|string $id_option

   * @return array|null
   * @throws Exception
   */

retrieveGroupIds.name: retrieveGroupIds
retrieveGroupIds.summary: Returns preferences' IDs from the option's ID and the given group ID.

doc.description:
Returns preferences' IDs from the option's ID and the given group ID.

```
$pref->retrieveGroupIdsIds('944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe', '930ac00324ef11eca47652540000cfbe');
```

retrieveGroupIds.comments:
/**
   * Returns preferences' IDs from the option's ID and the given group ID.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->retrieveGroupIdsIds('944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe', '930ac00324ef11eca47652540000cfbe');
   * ```
   *
   * @param null|string $id_option
   * @param string|null $id_group
   * @return array|null
   * @throws Exception
   */

isAuthorized.name: isAuthorized
isAuthorized.summary: Checks if the given user or the current user is authorized to access a user_option.
isAuthorized.comments:
/**
   * Checks if the given user or the current user is authorized to access a user_option.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->isAuthorized("930ac00324ef11eca47652540000cfbe");
   *
   * // (bool) = false;
   *
   * $pref->isAuthorized("eac3729c2b6c11eca47652540000cfbe");
   *
   * // (bool) = true;
   * ````
   *
   * @param string $id_user_option
   * @return bool
   * @throws Exception
   */

has.name: has
has.summary: Returns true if the current user can access a preference, false otherwise.
has.comments:
/**
   * Returns true if the current user can access a preference, false otherwise.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->has('9439491824ef11eca47652540000cfbe');

   * // (bool) = true;
   * ```

userHas.name: userHas
userHas.summary: Checks if a user has the given preference.
userHas.comments:
/**

groupHas.name: groupHas
groupHas.summary: Checks if a group has the given preference.
groupHas.comments:
/**

setUser.name: setUser
setUser.summary: Changes the current user and return the changed preferences class.
setUser.comments:
/**
   * Changes the current user and return the changed preferences class.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->setUser($ctrl->inc->user);
   *
   * //(bbn\User\Preferences) = $pref;
   *
   * ```

setGroup.name: setGroup

getAllNotMine.name: getAllNotMine
getAllNotMine.summary: Returns an array of the users' preferences (the current user and group are excluded) based on the given id_option.

arguments.name: with_config
arguments.description: config Adds the `cfg` field in the result if true

params.name: $with
params.description: config Adds the `cfg` field in the result if true

getAllNotMine.comments:
/**
   * Returns an array of the users' preferences (the current user and group are excluded) based on the given id_option.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->getAllNotMine('9439491824ef11eca47652540000cfbe', true);
   *
   * // (array) = [];
   * ```
   *
   * @param null|string $id_option
   * @param bool $with_config Adds the `cfg` field in the result if true
   * @return array|null
   * @throws Exception
   */

getByOption.name: getByOption
getByOption.summary: Returns the current user's preference and the config if second parameter set to true, based on the given option id, his own profile and his group.
getByOption.comments:
/**
   * Returns the current user's preference and the config if second parameter set to true, based on the given option id, his own profile and his group.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->getByOption('944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe', true);
   *
   * // (array) = [
   * //  "path" => "/",
   * //  "host" => "",
   * //  "user" => "",
   * //  "type" => "local",
   * //  "id" => "8380126d2b4d11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //  "id_option" => "944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //  "num" => null,
   * //  "id_user" => "930cc07724ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //  "id_group" => null,
   * //  "id_alias" => null,
   * //  "public" => 0,
   * //  "id_link" => null,
   * //  "text" => 1
   * // ];
   *
   * $pref->getByOption('944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe', false);
   *
   * // (array) = [
   * //   "id" => "8380126d2b4d11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_option" => "944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "num" => null,
   * //   "id_user" => "930cc07724ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_group" => null,
   * //   "id_alias" => null,
   * //   "public" => 0,
   * //   "id_link" => null,
   * //   "text" => 1,
   * //   "cfg" => "{"path":"\/","host":"","user":"","type":"local"}"
   * // ]
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $id_option
   * @param bool $with_config
   * @return array|null
   * @throws Exception
   */

option.name: option

fullOptions.name: fullOptions
fullOptions.summary: Returns all the children IDs of the given code with their property and their preferences.
fullOptions.comments:
/**
   * Returns all the children IDs of the given code with their property and their preferences.
   *
   * ```
   * //[
   * // [
   * //   "id" => "943d955824ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_parent" => "9439491824ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_alias" => null,
   * //   "num" => null,
   * //   "text" => "Favourites",
   * //   "code" => "favourites",
   * //   "value" => null,
   * //   "num_children" => 0,
   * //   "items" => [
   * //   ]
   * // ],
   * // [
   * //   "id" => "9c57439824ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_parent" => "9439491824ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_alias" => "9891c4d624ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "num" => null,
   * //   "text" => "Permissions",
   * //   "code" => "permissions",
   * //   "num_children" => 3,
   * //   "icon" => "nf nf-fa-key",
   * //   "alias" => [
   * //     "id" => "9891c4d624ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //     "id_parent" => "988d97ee24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //     "id_alias" => null,
   * //     "num" => null,
   * //     "text" => "Permissions",
   * //     "code" => "permissions",
   * //     "num_children" => 3,
   * //     "icon" => "nf nf-fa-key"
   * //   ],
   * //   "items" => [
   * //   ]
   * // ],
   * // [
   * //   "id" => "9ee7450224ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_parent" => "9439491824ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_alias" => "98a3dfca24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "num" => null,
   * //   "text" => "Plugins",
   * //   "code" => "plugins",
   * //   "num_children" => 0,
   * //   "icon" => "nf nf-md-puzzle",
   * //   "alias" => [
   * //     "id" => "98a3dfca24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //     "id_parent" => "988d97ee24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //     "id_alias" => null,
   * //     "num" => null,
   * //     "text" => "Plugins",
   * //     "code" => "plugins",
   * //     "num_children" => 0,
   * //     "icon" => "nf nf-md-puzzle"
   * //   ],
   * //   "items" => [
   * //   ]
   * // ],
   * // [
   * //   "id" => "944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_parent" => "9439491824ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //   "id_alias" => null,
   * //   "num" => null,
   * //   "text" => "Sources",
   * //   "code" => "sources",
   * //   "value" => null,
   * //   "num_children" => 0,
   * //   "items" => [
   * //     [
   * //       "path" => "/home/",
   * //       "host" => "185.142.53.114",
   * //       "pass" => "******",
   * //       "user" => "root",
   * //       "type" => "ssh",
   * //       "id" => "042b29722c2f11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //       "id_option" => "944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //       "num" => null,
   * //       "id_user" => "930cc07724ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //       "id_group" => null,
   * //       "id_alias" => null,
   * //       "public" => 0,
   * //       "id_link" => null,
   * //       "text" => "inova"
   * //     ],
   * //     [
   * //       "path" => "",
   * //       "host" => "qr.dev.bbn.io",
   * //       "user" => "qr",
   * //       "type" => "ssh",
   * //       "id" => "179d85a0284911eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //       "id_option" => "944190af24ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //       "num" => null,
   * //       "id_user" => "930cc07724ef11eca47652540000cfbe",
   * //       "id_group" => null,
   * //       "id_alias" => null,
   * //       "public" => 0,
   * //       "id_link" => null,
   * //       "text" => "quentin"
   * //     ],
   * //   ]
   * // ]
   * //];
   * ```
   *
   * @param $code
   * @return array|null
   * @throws Exception
   */

setByOption.name: setByOption
setByOption.summary: Sets the preference row for the current user by the option's ID

doc.description:
Sets the preference row for the current user by the option's ID

```
```

setByOption.comments:
/**
   * Sets the preference row for the current user by the option's ID
   *
   * ```
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $id_option
   * @param array $cfg
   * @return int
   * @throws Exception

set.name: set
set.summary: Sets the preference config for the current user by the preference's ID and returns the number of rows change.
set.comments:
/**
   * Sets the preference config for the current user by the preference's ID and returns the number of rows change.
   *
   * ```
   * $pref->set('042b29722c2f11eca47652540000cfbe', []);
   *
   * // (int) = 1;
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $id
   * @param array|null $cfg
   * @return int
   */

update.name: update
update.summary: Sets the preference row for the current user by the preference's ID and returns the number of rows change.
update.comments:
/**
   * Sets the preference row for the current user by the preference's ID and returns the number of rows change.
   *
   * ```
   * pref->update('106fc38f2b7f11eca47652540000cfbe', [
   *  "num" => null,
   *  "id_user" => "5d02d5ee269d11eca47652540000cfbe",
   *  "id_alias" => null,
   *  "id_link" => null,
   *  "text" => "Nextcloud"
   * ]);
   *
   * // (int) = 1;
   * ```
   *
   * @param string $id
   * @param array  $cfg
   * @return int
   */

add.name: add

   * $pref->add('9439491824ef11eca47652540000cfbe', [
   *  "num" => null,
   *  "id_user" => "5d02d5ee269d11eca47652540000cfbe",
   *  "id_group" => null,
   *  "id_alias" => null,
   *  "public" => 0,
   *  "id_link" => null,
   *  "text" => "Test"
   * ]);
   *
   * // (String) = "3ad7768e30c311eca47652540000cfbe";
   *
   * ```

dummyComments:
/**
 * A user's preference system linked to options and user classes
 *
 * A preference consists in a row with an ID_OPTION and a ID_USER, ID_GROUP, or PUBLIC.
 * The class needs a user object on which each query will be based.
 * This class must be able to:
 * - read options with the same arguments as the option class (filtered based on preference existence)
 * - retrieve preference(s) for an option
 * - write preference by adding to an existing set or setting a unique
 *
 *
 *
 * @author Thomas Nabet <thomas.nabet@gmail.com>
 * @copyright BBN Solutions
 * @since Oct 28, 2015, 10:23:55 +0000
 * @category  Authentication
 * @license   http://opensource.org/licenses/MIT MIT
 * @version 0.1
 * @todo Groups and hotlinks features
 */
summary: A user's preference system linked to options and user classes
description:
A preference consists in a row with an ID_OPTION and a ID_USER, ID_GROUP, or PUBLIC.
The class needs a user object on which each query will be based.
This class must be able to:
- read options with the same arguments as the option class (filtered based on preference existence)
- retrieve preference(s) for an option
- write preference by adding to an existing set or setting a unique

description_parts.content:
A preference consists in a row with an ID_OPTION and a ID_USER, ID_GROUP, or PUBLIC.
The class needs a user object on which each query will be based.
This class must be able to:
- read options with the same arguments as the option class (filtered based on preference existence)
- retrieve preference(s) for an option
- write preference by adding to an existing set or setting a unique
